    value = 0

    value = 0

    value = 0

        limit = {
            bpm_iga_institutional_exploitation_possible_trigger = yes

        add = bpm_agenda_institutional_exploitation_weight

        limit = {
            bpm_iga_ideological_grifting_possible_trigger = yes
